20

Here’s my version of the history

a few years ago there was the numbers Union, which was a loose union between to positives and negatives. They we rivals and there was tension but for the most part there was peace. In the Nation there was an interesting system of government where there were 2 council lands, the lands that were controlled by the negative republic, and the lands controlled by the positive Empire before unification, each of the lands were ruled independently by a council, and there was a national council that kept the peace between the two. And for the last few years a faction called the photons begrab gaining popularity in proton city, the positive capital.

the photons wanted to destroy the union and recreate the positive empire. They created a plan to destroy the negatives, but the negatives found out and were going to publish what they found, so the positives invoked martial law and invaded negative lands. They punched all the way to the 30s before the negative army was able to mobilize and fight back.

This is the history for this specific battles, or for the whole three Number Wars?

It's very close to my version, though.

17

Edited May 5, 2022 by Akagi

After that the negatives organized a swift counterattack that drove the positives back from their lands. After that the positives engaged in an offensive into uninhabited positive lands, which they won easily. To try to turn the tides the negatives fortified their border and invaded the resource filled island to the east of them, the positives fought very hard and the most brutal attritional battles were fought on that island with huge casualties, by the time of writing this the positives have been almost completely driven off the island

1 minute ago, SSTO Crasher said:

This is just the third war

My proposition is:

At the beginning + and - lived united, on the same place. + were axed on land and - on water and seas. That Union's government was composed of two leaders, a + and a -.

Some day, the + leader wanted to destroy the - to restore + supremacy or something. He secretly imprisoned the - leader in a faraway prison on a rock in the middle of the sea, and then hid some jewels. The next morning everyone knew that the - leader disappeared, and the jewels too. The + leader said that the - leader was a thief and that - were traitors. Begining of NW1, which is the - trying to leave the + empire without dying.

After they successfully flew away (with their leader) there was a period of relative peace.

The came NW2 when + tried to destroy the young Negative Union (a republic), war ended by having to distinct nations, the + empire and the - union.

Then a few years of peace, and then...

General Atomikku started NW3 by attacking a - land/island/whatever you want. We are now in this war, the goal of + being to destroy the - and the - goal to take the + capital and make them pay for what they did to them.

Akagi you mean 15?

OK, 14.
